name: CbcOrClpParam
brief:
Shared parameter codes for Cbc and Clp solvers

Legacy parameter handling shared between Cbc (branch-and-cut) and Clp
(linear programming). This file is intentionally duplicated between
Cbc/Test and Clp/Test for simplicity.

Parameter code ranges (CbcOrClpParameterType):
- 1-100: Double parameters (CLP_PARAM_DBL_*, CBC_PARAM_DBL_*)
- 101-200: Integer parameters (CLP_PARAM_INT_*, CBC_PARAM_INT_*)
- 201-300: Clp string parameters
- 301-400: Cbc string parameters
- 401-500: Clp actions (mostly)
- 501-600: Cbc actions (mostly)

Conditional compilation:
- COIN_HAS_CBC: Include Cbc-specific parameters
- COIN_HAS_CLP: Include Clp-specific parameters

Note: Being superseded by ClpParam/CbcParam for cleaner separation.
see: ClpParam for modern Clp parameter handling

ClpParameters for parameter container
@deprecated Use ClpParam for new code
